assignments.name: Assignment 1: Classic Film Analysis
assignments.description: Watch 'The Shawshank Redemption' and answer questions about its themes and cinematography. What is the central theme of 'The Shawshank Redemption'?

assignments.name: Assignment 2: Film History and Evolution
assignments.description: Study the development of cinema from silent films to modern blockbusters. Who is considered the pioneer of modern filmmaking techniques? The upload file should be named as StudentID_FILM101_Assignment2.md

assignments.name: Assignment 3: Genre Analysis
assignments.description: Explore different film genres and their unique characteristics. What is a defining characteristic of Film Noir?

assignments.name: Assignment 4: Cinematography and Visual Storytelling
assignments.description: Analyze how camera work and visual elements enhance storytelling. What cinematographic technique is used to create psychological tension? The upload file should be named as StudentID_FILM101_Assignment4.md

assignments.name: Assignment 5: International Cinema
assignments.description: Explore cinema from different cultures and countries. Which film movement emphasized realism and everyday life?

assignments.name: Assignment 6: Contemporary Cinema Trends
assignments.description: Analyze current trends in modern filmmaking and digital cinema. How has streaming technology impacted modern cinema? The upload file should be named as StudentID_FILM101_Assignment6.md

announcement.title: Cinema Culture Appreciation Course Announcement
announcement.content:
Dear Students,

Welcome to Cinema Culture Appreciation! This course will assess your learning through 6 assignments:

üìö Assignment 1: Classic Film Analysis (Due: Jan 15)
üìö Assignment 2: Film History and Evolution (Due: Jan 22)
üìö Assignment 3: Genre Analysis (Due: Jan 29)
üìö Assignment 4: Cinematography and Visual Storytelling (Due: Feb 5)
üìö Assignment 5: International Cinema (Due: Feb 12)
üìö Assignment 6: Contemporary Cinema Trends (Due: Feb 19)

Please complete all assignments on time.

Happy learning!

Course Instructor

quiz.title: CS101 Midterm Quiz - Computer Science Fundamentals
quiz.description: This quiz covers fundamental concepts in computer science including basic programming concepts, computer architecture, and problem-solving approaches.

questions.question_text: What is the primary function of an operating system?

answers.answer_text: To manage computer hardware and software resources

questions.question_text: Which data structure follows the Last-In-First-Out (LIFO) principle?

assignment.name: CS101 Unit 2 Homework Assignment
assignment.description:
Complete the exercises from Chapter 2 of the textbook, including operating system concepts and data structure implementation. Please provide handwritten solutions and scan them as PDF for submission.

Specific Requirements:
1. Explain the three main functions of an operating system
2. Implement a simple stack data structure
3. Analyze time complexity

Submission Format: PDF file, filename format: StudentID_Name_CS101_Assignment2.md
